{{Infobox Berry |name = #57 Rowap |image = [[File:Rowap.png]] |caption = In days of old, people worked the top-shaped pieces of this Berry free and used them as toys. |growtime = 5h 54m 0s |harvest = 1 berry |replant = 5% |points = 2,900 |flavor =
*10 spicy *0 dry *0 sweet *0 bitter *40 sour }} == Description == '''Rowap''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by having at least one empty plot and at least 600 points of sour on the field. The [[Belue]] must be unlocked to unlock this berry. == Growth Tables == === Growth Stages === {| class="wikitable" !!! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 1 hour 36 mins || 2 hours 30 mins || 3 hours 54 mins || 5 hours 54 mins - 11 hours 48 mins |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:RowapTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:RowapTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:RowapTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Ripening Time with Modifiers === {| class="wikitable collapsible" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time !! Boost Mulch Needed to Ripen |- ! None | 5 hours 54 mins -
11 hours 48 mins || --- |- ! Mulch/Sprayduck | 3 hours 56 mins -
7 hours 52 mins || 48 mulch |- ! Mulch*Sprayduck | 2 hours 37 mins 20 secs -
5 hours 14 mins 40 secs || 32 mulch |} == Mutation Strategy == === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your [[farm]] in following way to obtain Rowap berry. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- | style="width: 50px;" | || style="width: 50px;" | [[File:Belue.png|30px]]
